Web Service Endpoint# POST /v1/reviewSubmissionItems

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-reviewSubmissionItems#url)



```
POST https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/reviewSubmissionItems
```

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-reviewSubmissionItems#http-body)

`[ReviewSubmissionItemCreateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/reviewsubmissionitemcreaterequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`
